price: I čim bi silu Našu osjetili, kud koji bi se iz njih razbježali.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ أَحَسُّواْ بَأۡسَنَآ إِذَا هُم مِّنۡهَا يَرۡكُضُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falammā aḥassū basanā idhā hum min'hā yarkuḍūna
